title: Crypto Educator: ‘Everyone Buys Bitcoin at the Price They Deserve’

title: MS Wallet Drainer Has Siphoned Over $58 Million Using Google and X Phishing Ads
description: A recent report from Scam Sniffer, an anti-scam solution, revealed that MS Wallet Drainer, a cryptocurrency malware tool, has managed to siphon over $58 million in crypto since March. The drainer uses Google search and X ads phishing links as a distribution vector and has affected over 63,000 victims as of December 21. MS Drainer […]

title: Ethereum whale sets date for ETH to reach $10,000, reckons it is better to stack up Retik Finance (RETIK) at the current Price

title: Indian engineer loses $114K to crypto investment scam
description: In a distressing disclosure, a 53-year-old Indian engineer recently fell prey to a cryptocurrency investment scam that resulted in a loss of Rs 95 lakh — equivalent to US$114,230.  The unsuspecting victim, who lives in the Indian city of Bengaluru,…

title: TEL plunges 40% following Telcoin app exploit
